name.description: Extension name. Displayed in the manifest and pane header

description.message: Password generator extension allows you to easily generate long and secure password in one click

success.message: Password has been generated and copied to your clipboard
success.description: Message which is shown after successful creation of a password

fail.message: Invalid generator settings. No password was generated
fail.description: Message which is shown after a creation of password failed

notEnoughChars.message: With your current settings, your password length should not exceed %MIN_CHARS% characters
notEnoughChars.description: Message which is shown if there's no enough characters to create a password

lengthPrompt.message: Set password length. Press OK to use default password length (%LEN% characters)
lengthPrompt.description: A prompt message when user generates a password

showButton.message: Insert "Generate password" button below password fields

showContext.message: Add "Generate password" action to context menu

promptForLength.message: Prompt for password length every time before generating
